info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Warren and central Washington Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 312 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Luzerne Campground, or near Lake George Village, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Whitehall, Lake George Village, Comstock, Lake Luzerne Campground, Glens Falls North, Queensbury, Kingsbury, Mount Hope, Bolton, Hadley, Lake George, Stony Creek, Fort Ann, Thurman Station, Cleverdale, Beartown, Smiths Basin, North Granville and South Bay Village. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 20 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized poor drainage flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
